column4: I want to short my terminal name how it is possible my terminal name is harsh@harsh-3000-N100-Invalid-entry-length-0-DMI-table-is-broken-Stop:~$
Do you mean that's the name of your terminal window?
The title of your terminal window is usually something you can set as a preference.  If you tell me which terminal application you're using, I can run it and see where the preference is.
If you don't know which, I'll give you a command to find out.
ok can u plz give me the command
see the result of this command http://pastebin.com/Qc81PVcw
by using your setting i am able to change my terminal name onlye
In your terminal, you can go to Edit-> Profile Preferences Then choose the Title and Command tab.
Can you click the Edit menu at the top of your terminal?
Can you select "Profile Preferences" from that menu?
Next to the "General" Tab is the "Title and Command" tab.
A lot of terminals change the title of the window to reflect output inside the terminal.  I'm suggesting you try to turn that off.
Underneath the Initial Title box, there shoudl be a dropdown that says "Replace initial title" Correct?
It was theadmin who helped you.
but you give me the time  of conversation
